content: hi My name is Jadyn Forbes and I am CoEditor in Chief this year PERIOD I am a senior double major in Digital Media and Strategic Public Relations originally from Indianola Iowa PERIOD Since being on campus I have also become involved with positions as the Creative Services Director for KBVU the Treasurer for the Society of Collegiate Journalists and a current 5time record holder for the Track and Field team PERIOD I have always enjoyed storytelling through forms of writing audio and multimedia PERIOD My hopes for this year are not only to grow as a journalist alongside our fellow staff writers but also to utilize any opportunities for sharing the stories of our community and properly covering surrounding realworld topics as well
